name: Boomeranged
description:
Boomeranged is a platformer where you throw boomerangs with different abilities.

Controls:
WASD / Arrow Keys - Move around
Space / W / Up arrow - Jump, hold the button to jump higher
Z / E - Throw your currently equiped boomerang

There are:
- 3 Levels (Originally 5 but some had to be removed  due to difficulties with WebGL)
- 3 different boomrangs, each with their own unique ability
- 5 different enemy types, each with a different behaviour
- A encyclopedia filled with info about enemies and boomerangs
- Combat gameplay, going from platforming to fighting a bunch of enemies
- Checkpoints in every level

This game was made for the Vim Jam game jam, with the theme: "There and back" and a jam focus of "Collectibles".
This is to be expected, but this game might be super buggy! We didn't get time to playtest the game, so there might be a bug here or there.

Game made by: RCJ15 & Vallenium
